tooltip:
Subject / Title

Helps Nova understand the user's intent at a glance. Clear, concise titles route requests to the right support team and speed up response time.

Subtitle / Instructions

Provides users with context or guidance for filling out the form, ensuring clarity and reducing errors.
This dropdown routes issues to the right teams instantly. Behind it? A flow map designed to minimize confusion and get answers faster.
This field encourages storytelling. We optimized the character count, readability, and autosave logic to help users describe their issue without pressure.
This custom uploader was tested across devices, browsers, and bandwidth states. Drag-and-drop or click—it works how the user wants it to.

Privacy Notice

Explains how user data is handled, ensuring transparency and compliance with privacy standards.

Help / FAQ

Provides quick access to help resources or frequently asked questions, supporting self-service and reducing support load.
A small guardian at the gate. This invisible checkpoint helps defend support channels from spam while respecting real players.
A final click, styled for confidence. It’s more than just ‘submit’—it’s the moment support begins.
